comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content:
The March, 1924 date on the negative probably indicates a re-use when he was elevated to cardinal.  From the wikipedia entry:
"Pope Pius XI created him Cardinal-Priest of Santa Maria del Popolo in the consistory of March 24, 1924."

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq and artolog: Thanks for the additional information. The original date of the negative, from the sticker in the upper left corner is Feb. __, 1916, so it seems it was originally taken to mark when he became Archbishop of Chicago and the later dates reflect his elevation to Cardinal in 1924. Nice to be able to match significant events to both dates!  We will update the record to reflect this more complete information.
